description: Associates the specified transit gateway attachment with a transit gateway policy table.

parameters.name: TransitGatewayPolicyTableId
parameters.description: The ID of the transit gateway policy table to associate with the transit gateway attachment.

parameters.name: TransitGatewayAttachmentId
parameters.description: The ID of the transit gateway attachment to associate with the policy table.

nested_items.name: Association
nested_items.description: Describes the association of a transit gateway and a transit gateway policy table.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayPolicyTableId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway policy table.

nested_items.name: TransitGatewayAttachmentId
nested_items.description: The ID of the transit gateway attachment.

nested_items.name: ResourceId
nested_items.description: The resource ID of the transit gateway attachment.

nested_items.name: ResourceType
nested_items.description: The resource type for the transit gateway policy table association.

nested_items.name: State
nested_items.description: The state of the transit gateway policy table association.
